description: Jaime Molina x Smartwool is here to bring more style and natural performance to your hiking kit. Their Hike Light Cushion Def Lyfe Print Crew Socks feature plenty of color and even more comfort — thanks to body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability and the magic of responsibly sourced Merino wool. Keep your feet feeling their best on every outing with these versatile, durable hiking socks.
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Def Lyfe Print Crew Socks - Mens
